title: How to patch object file in static library / how to extract object file that has full path within archive
content:
I am trying to extract an object file (.obj) from a Windows static (.lib) library so I can patch it in IDA, then rearchive it back into the library. I am doing this because IDA won't allow me to patch a static library containing multiple object files.

I am trying to use the ar that comes with mingw. The file I am looking to extract has a full path (e.g. "E:/some/path/to/filename.obj" - the forward slashes are correct). I can see this file as listed when I run ar -t library.lib. However, when I run ar -x library.lib E:/some/path/to/filename.obj I get an error "no entry E:/some/path/to/filename.obj in archive".

What am I doing wrong please? Or can I apply a patch to an object file within a static library using IDA directly?
